dt-option.name: select.blurable
dt-option.summary: Indicate if the selected items will be removed when clicking outside of the table

type.description: Enable the blurable option of Select (`true`) or not (`false`).

dt-option.description: This option provides the ability to have a table act like a select list whereby any items that are selected will be automatically deselected when clicking outside of a DataTable. This can be useful to make a table "feel" more like a native operating system control, or if you have multiple tables on a page where only one should have selection at a time.

example.title: Remove selected items when clicking outside of the table
